description: Detects changes to the Internet Explorer "DisableFirstRunCustomize" value, which prevents Internet Explorer from running the first run wizard the first time a user starts the browser after installing Internet Explorer or Windows.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
false_positives: As this is controlled by group policy as well as user settings. Some false positives may occur.
name: Internet Explorer DisableFirstRunCustomize Enabled
query: ((winlog.event_data.EventType:"SetValue" AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:*\\Microsoft\\Internet\ Explorer\\Main\\DisableFirstRunCustomize AND winlog.event_data.Details:("DWORD (0x00000001)" OR "DWORD (0x00000002)")) AND (NOT process.executable.text:("C:\Windows\explorer.exe" OR "C:\Windows\System32\ie4uinit.exe")))
